Package model

Class ProjectsPhase

java.lang.Object
model.ProjectsPhase
public class ProjectsPhase extends Object
this class represents a phase in a project.

    • getFirstValidPosition

      public int getFirstValidPosition()
      search in the array of capsules if exists one valid position.
      Returns:
      :int the method returns -1 if the position does not exist, a number in [0, 49] if exist a valid position.

    • isCapsulesLimitReached

      public boolean isCapsulesLimitReached()
      This method checks if its posible to register another capsule.
      Returns:
      : boolean false if it isn't posible to register another capsule or true if it is possible.

    • searchKnowledgeCapsule

      public int searchKnowledgeCapsule(String searchCapsule)
      This method searchs if there is a project with an especified id.
      Parameters:
      searchCapsule - : String the especified projects id.
      Returns:
      : int it returns -1 if there is no capsule with that especified id or a number between [0,49] if it is.
